subject: Australian Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic gave himself the rare chance to get to bed at a reasonable hour by transforming his night-session Australian Open semifinal with David Ferrer on Thursday into a 6-2, 6-2, 6-1 rout.
snippet: Novak Djokovic gave himself the rare chance to get to bed at a reasonable hour by transforming his night-session Australian Open semifinal with David Ferrer on Thursday into a 6-2, 6-2, 6-1 rout.
